rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0001
rows.name:
In the city of Torigo, I serve as the representative
of the Gulan people... the Chief, so to speak.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought it was just a title until now, but since
Morph was demoted, I've been terribly busy.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0003
rows.name:
In the old days, we would hold discussions centered on
the High Chief and decide on Gula's policies, but...

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Since we came under Superbia's rule, they hold the
real power in political and military affairs.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0005
rows.name:
That kind of know-how was never passed down
to us Gulan people.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Even if it's only temporary, governing the city
is truly a difficult task...

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I thought that man Morph was a good-for-nothing
consul, but maybe he was actually quite skilled.
